title: Cantor's Defeat Brings An End To Prickly Relationship With Obama
teaser: As the dust settles on House Majority Leader Eric Cantor's primary defeat, some have begun to reflect on his relationship with President Obama. From the very start, it was a prickly one, with divisions only deepening throughout Obama's time in office.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
